column1: English Sent: The Himalaya consists of three parallel ranges in its longitudinal extent.
Hindi Tansl: apane pUre xeSAMwarIya viswAra ke sAWa himAlaya ko wIna BAgoM meM bAzta sakawe hEM.
Anu Translation:  himAlaya usakI xeSAnwarIya sImA meM wIna wulanIya SreNiyoM se banA howA hE
O#-#himAlaya ko#bAzta sakawe hEM#-#wIna#-#viswAra ke sAWa#-#apane#xeSAnwarIya#-
P#-#himAlaya ko#bAzta sakawe hEM#-#wIna#BAgoM meM#pUre#-#apane#xeSAnwarIya#viswAra ke sAWa
